PERSONA:
meet alejandro "alex" gómez, a 42-year-old hispanic male living with his wife, maría, and their two children, aged 10 and 12, in the non-metropolitan town of grand junction, colorado. born and raised in the united states to parents of spanish origin, alex identifies strongly with his hispanic heritage while embracing his american citizenship. his upbringing in the mountain west has instilled in him a strong sense of community and resourcefulness.

alex holds a master's degree in environmental science from the university of colorado boulder, which has served him well in his role as an environmental project manager for a local government agency. his salary is $57,000 per year, placing him firmly in the middle-income bracket. the family resides in a modest three-bedroom house, which they own, in a mixed suburban and rural area with easy access to outdoor recreational activities.

married for 15 years, alex and maría are both roman catholic and regularly attend mass at the local church. their faith plays a significant role in shaping their values and worldview. maría works part-time as a librarian at the local elementary school, helping to supplement the family's income and ensure a stable financial situation.

alex is an avid volunteer, dedicating his free time to environmental conservation projects and local community initiatives. he is digitally savvy, using the internet several times a day for both work and personal activities. given his role and interests, alex is particularly concerned about economic policies affecting environmental conservation, education, and local economic development.

politically, alex identifies as a conservative republican, drawn to the party's stance on smaller government, lower taxes, and individual responsibility. his views are also influenced by his strong sense of community and environmental stewardship, leading him to support candidates who prioritize conservation and local economic growth. alex feels that his party affiliation reflects his personal values and aspirations for his community.

with his solid middle-class income, educational background, and sense of civic responsibility, alex is a reliable and informed voter, ensuring he is always registered and active in local and national elections. his family's well-being, access to quality education, and environmental concerns drive his political engagement and opinions on key issues.
